name: GO PUSH THE RAGDOLL FALL: To Kill The Stickman
name_original: GO PUSH THE RAGDOLL FALL: To Kill The Stickman
description:
- Throw the ragdoll off buildings and smash him as much as you can.
- Play against a 2nd player and get the highest pain points. The winner takes all.
- Unlock all the new levels and place bigger and bigger bets.
- Fill your vault with gold as you win more and more rounds.
- Throw the rag doll in to trains, off castles, in to pits, off a snow mountain and more.

Download it now and enjoy some seriously funny rag doll physics fun :)
